n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>CHINOOK</SCHEMA> <NAME>JV$DCUSTOMER</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_FLAG</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_SUBSCRIBER</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_DATE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CUSTOMERID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>FIRSTNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LASTNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COMPANY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>STATE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>POSTALCODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>FAX</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>EMAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SUPPORTREPID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE JRN_DATE, JRN.CUSTOMERID CUSTOMERID, TARG.FIRSTNAME FIRSTNAME, TARG.LASTNAME LASTNAME, TARG.COMPANY COMPANY, TARG.ADDRESS ADDRESS, TARG.CITY CITY, TARG.STATE STATE, TARG.COUNTRY COUNTRY, TARG.POSTALCODE POSTALCODE, TARG.PHONE PHONE, TARG.FAX FAX, TARG.EMAIL EMAIL, TARG.SUPPORTREPID SUPPORTREPID from ( select L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER JRN_SUBSCRIBER, L.CUSTOMERID CUSTOMERID, max(L.JRN_DATE) JRN_DATE from CHINOOK.J$CUSTOMER L group by L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, L.CUSTOMERID ) JRN, CHINOOK.CUSTOMER TARG where JRN.CUSTOMERID = TARG.CUSTOMERID (+)</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
